text:
Unite - Los Angeles, Prague - Fulltime or Interns

We're a stealthy startup looking for engineers to join our small highly skilled team based in Los Angeles. We are building a global data marketplace, with a focus on advertising industry. We are growing incredibly fast â€” our servers handle 2000 requests per second and serve more than 700 million users. We are looking for experienced front-end developers and full-stack engineers. We use Angular/ES6 on the front end and Java/Cassandra/Kafka/Storm on the back end.

Feel free to ping me anytime at engineering@unite.io.
